titleStmt.title: Legislative Assembly of Prince Edward Island, 10 May 1866, Prince Edward Island Confederation with Canada.

respStmt.resp: Selection of input documents and completion of metadata

publicationStmt.p: Published by The Confederation Debates project.

sourceDesc.bibl: Debates and Proceedings of the House of Assembly of Prince Edward Island, for the Year 1866, Being the Fourth Session of the Twenty-Second General Assembly.. . Charlottetown, P.E.I.: "The Examiner" Office.

revisionDesc.change: Transformed initial template file to incorporate corrected OCR content.

div.head: THURSDAY, May 10.
div.p:
The Committee appointed to prepare an Address to Her Majesty
the Queen, expressive of the views of the House of Assembly upon
the subject of Confederation, submitted an Address, which was
adopted.

An address was also prepared and adopted, requesting His Ex
cellency the Lieut. Governor to be pleased to forward to Her
Majesty the Queen the said Address of the House ofÂ Assembly on
Colonial Confederation
